notes:
This pertains to all three occurrences of the word "PKIMessages" in sections 2, 2.3, and 2.5.

"PKIMessages" can be misinterpreted as the ASN.1 type "PKIMessages", defined as:

    PKIMessages ::= SEQUENCE SIZE (1..MAX) OF PKIMessage

Yet what is meant in all three occurrences in this RFC is simply: PKIMessage structures 
(i.e., one ore more structures of type PKIMessage), not a list/sequence of PKIMessage.

Note: The same disambiguation has already been done in RFC 9811 
(as mentioned in https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-ietf-lamps-rfc6712bis/10/).
